content:
Capture.PNG
Hello all! I wanted to ask about how to set up my JupyterHub with NCAR. I'm going to be using it to ingest in large amounts of anemometer data from WxT and Sonic, and to plot up some big data. This will be my first time using this so I was wondering if anyone here could perhaps help me with the settings I will need? Any help is appreciated. Thank you! :)
I'm just not really sure what to put for many of these settings.
This may help: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dlrtt74FMCs

This may help: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dlrtt74FMCs

Hi, thanks for the video! I'm not sure what Project account is, though? Do you have any ideas?

@Muntaha Pasha The easiest way to find out which project codes you may have access on cheyenne is to is to log onto https://sam.ucar.edu/. Then go to the "Reports" pull down tab and select "My Account Statements". If you have more than one project listed, you might want to email someone in your group to find out which to use.
